document.full_text: a clutch hit from pinch hitter justin turner in the eighth inning gave the new york mets a 4-2 win over the slumping los angeles dodgers at citi field on saturday.
document.title: turner propels mets to win over slumping dodgers
lines_and_colors: a clutch hit from pinch hitter justin turner in the eighth inning gave the new york mets a 4-2 win over the slumping los angeles dodgers at citi field on saturday.
